title: "The application was unable to start correctly (0xc00007b)"

embed.description: Pastebin PRO Accounts EASTER SPECIAL! For a limited time only get 40% discount on a LIFETIME PRO account! Offer Ends Soon!

body:
Hey guys,

Coming back to league after a while and have since upgraded to Windows 10, went to play a game but right after champ select when the actual game opens the error "The application was unable to start correctly (0xc00007b)" and won't open the game. I've got my windows up to date, .net's all up to date etc, so i ran a dependency walker on lol and it came back with... a lot. I've included a link to a list of the dll's it's telling me I'm missing, but i find it hard to believe there's that many missing that weren't included in the window's updates or rolled out in the app by Riot themselves. Does anyone know if there's a way to fix this? Or if there's maybe had a zip containing all or some of them so I don't have to go download them one by one (which would take hours) that'd be much appreciated.

Cheers,
Rory
